entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
